results.content: Loving the explanation of the course, really helping with me learning props and state.
results.content_html: Loving the explanation of the course, really helping with me learning props and state.

results.content:
I thoroughly enjoyed this course! I am a fan of Nick's courses and was glad when I was notified this course was released. With Mohammad's great explanation and Nick's implementation with Django, it was a perfect way to get introduced to React. 

Now I have to decide what path/stack I want to commit to, whether I use React/Django or commit to full JS stack using Node/Express with React. Not sure if there are any benefits to either or if its just up to preference.
results.content_html:
I thoroughly enjoyed this course! I am a fan of Nick's courses and was glad when I was notified this course was released. With Mohammad's great explanation and Nick's implementation with Django, it was a perfect way to get introduced to React.

Now I have to decide what path/stack I want to commit to, whether I use React/Django or commit to full JS stack using Node/Express with React. Not sure if there are any benefits to either or if its just up to preference.
